s1.name: Recent news
s1.subtitle: March, 11th 2002: JORAM 3.0 available
s1.p:
JORAM 3.0 is now available for download. Documentation has also been updated and new samples are provided.
Compared to JORAM previous versions, this new release is a complete re-factoring of the code base. It gets rid of the previous limitations and defects. The JMS specification is now fully implemented, JORAM provides authentication and security features, and introduces a distributed implementation of the Topic destination. Its clean and sound code basis guarantees fast and easy future developements and enhancements.
A suite of tests based on JUnit will be very soon proposed for download.
Please do not hesitate to keep us informed of any inconsistancy or problem you may encounter with the new distribution and documentation.
We sincerely hope you will enjoy this new version.

s1.name: JORAM: Java (TM) Open Reliable Asynchronous Messaging
s1.p: JORAM incorporates a 100% pure Java implementation of JMS (Java Message Service API released by Sun Microsystem, Inc.). It provides access to a MOM (Message Oriented Middleware), built on top of the Scalagent agents based distributed platform. JORAM is a free, open source initiative.

s2.name: Specification
s2.p: JORAM provides large support to JMS 1.0.2a.

ul.li: ASF classes and methods for performing JMS operations through an application server.

s2.name: Downloading JORAM
s2.p: JORAM source code and binary version are available. JORAM also provides basic test files and demos.

ul.li: Have a look at the license.

Browse the download area for:
joram_jar.tar.gz and joram_jar.zip including JORAM jars and simple tests codes.
joram_src_jar.tar.gz and joram_src_jar.zip including JORAM source, jars, tests and demo.
JORAM source, tests and demo are also available through CVS (no tag should be used to get latest version).
You may also download JORAM's html documentation: zip or tar.gz.

s2.name: Installing and using JORAM
s2.p: For quickly installing JORAM please follow our instructions.

ul.li: Check prerequisites and instructions at JORAM installation.
Have a first go with JORAM thanks to the samples.

s2.name: Getting involved
s2.p: Any input or personal view for improving and/or developing JORAM is welcome. JORAM, as an open source project, also welcomes external contributions. Interested? Contact us.
